newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Brazil's Celesc upgraded.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Brazil's Celesc upgraded.

text.p: -- HSBC James Capel said it upgraded Santa Catarina state power firm Celesc to buy from long-term buy.
-- It said in a report the upgrade is based on increased likelihood of an official announcement of Santa Catarina state government's plans to privatize Celesc.
-- It said news that Santa Catarina state, which is Celesc's majority shareholder, is studying the company's privatization pushed the share price up 13.1 percent on Tuesday.
-- Government sources stated that a document which proposes the sale of major state assets, including Celesc, is to be put before the state legislative assembly in early March, it added.
-- "We believe the chances of an official announcement of the company's privatization are now very high and could move prices strongly upwards," it added.
-- After yesterday's surge, Celesc preferred traded at 1.45 reais, off 0.68 percent, this morning on the Sao Paulo bourse.
